casebody.data:
STATE OF NEW JERSEY v. JAMES H. BOLITHO. Decided June 19, 1925.

Before Justices Tberchaed, Mirtubr and Lloyd.

Eor the defendant-petitioner, John A. Matthews. Contra, Wilfred II. Jayne, Jr., assistant attorney-general. Pee Cubiam.

We have considered the various matters and arguments urged by the petitioner, and have concluded that the petition presented at this late day presents no shfficient reason for an order for a foreign jury.

The application is accordingly^ denied.
